prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with a striking red and blue color scheme that emphasizes its fighting abilities.
I want a psychic/fighting type Pokemon that features unique traits like a large head and slender limbs.
Generate a Pokemon design that has a humanoid shape with a mix of red, blue, and yellow accents.
Make a dynamic fighter Pokemon with a strong presence, showcasing its agility and combat skills.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends fighting and psychic elements, featuring distinctive elongated limbs and a meditative aura.
Design a unique Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, showcasing its agility and combat prowess.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies both strength and grace, with vibrant colors and a captivating design.

distinctive_features: Unique head shape with a red gem
Short torso with a wide lower body
